item.title: Dragon's rest
item.description: Dragon‚Äôs Rest Location Information A long path leads from the rocky shore up the side of the cliff, with occasional stairs to ease the ascent. Here and there along the lower part of the path, well-tended garden plots hold flowers, herbs, and vegetables.

item.title: General
item.description: Information Stormwreck Isle is located in the Sea of Swords about 3.5 miles from the coast of Faer√ªn near the High Road. It is south of Neverwinter, and is very close to that city.

item.title: (Kobold) Laylee
item.description: Laylee Information Laylee is a kobold living on Dragon‚Äôs rest She is the primary helper of (Kobold) Myla. Really enthousiastic about homebrewed inventions, like an improvised weapon she made, the ScorpoStick; a long stick with a scropion in a cage at the end.
